AU.name: Turbo : Super Stunt Squad
AU.description: Bring Turbo’s incredible snail stunts and races to life! Turbo: Super Stunt Squad is a high-velocity action racing game featuring the super-charged crew from the film Turbo. Each character has their own signature style and tricked-out skills such as jumps, drifts, grinds, flips and other super-cool stunt moves. Expert skills will also prove useful to earn power-ups, customize your character, discover shortcuts, and win the race in the larger-than-life environments of Turbo! • Perform awesome stunts! – Use the environment to perform one-of-a-kind Turbo-ized stunts to get ahead in the race • Shells with unique abilities – Each shell gives to your character unique abilities!

BE.name: Turbo : Équipe de Cascadeurs
BE.description: Réalise des cascades et des courses incroyables avec l'équipe de Turbo ! Turbo : Équipe de Cascadeurs est un jeu de course à grande vitesse bourré d'action dont les héros survoltés sont tout droit sortis du film Turbo. Chaque personnage jouable dispose de son propre style de pilotage, de figures et de compétences spéciales. Celles-ci permettent également de gagner des bonus, de customiser les personnages, de trouver des raccourcis et de gagner la course dans les vastes environnements du monde de Turbo ! • Réalise de super cascades – Utilise ton environnement pour réaliser des cascades de folie et arriver en tête de la course • Des coquilles uniques – Chaque coquille permet à ton personnage d'utiliser des compétences uniques !

IE.name: Turbo: Super Stunt Squad

CH.name: Turbo: Die Super-Stunt-Gang
CH.description: Erwecke Turbos unglaubliche Schneckenstunts und Rennen zum Leben! Turbo: Die Super-Stunt-Gang ist ein hochoktaniges Action-Rennspiel mit dem super-tastischen Team aus dem Film. Jeder Charakter verfügt über seinen eigenen Stil, trick-tastische Jumps, Drifts, Grinds, Flips und andere supercoole Stunts. Besondere Fähigkeiten helfen dir, Power-ups zu erringen, deinen Charakter individuell zu gestalten, Abkürzungen zu entdecken und das Rennen in den überlebensgroßen Umgebungen von Turbos Welt zu gewinnen! • Hammermäßige Stunts! – Nutze die Umgebung für einmalige, turbo-tastische Stunts und behalte im Rennen die Nase vorn • Häuser mit einzigartigen Fähigkeiten: Jedes Haus verleiht deinem Charakter einzigartige Fähigkeiten!

ES.name: Turbo: Super Stunt Squad
ES.description: ¡Da vida a las acrobacias y carreras de Turbo! Turbo: Super Stunt Squad es un juego de acción y velocidad con los "revolucionados" personajes de Turbo, la película que DreamWorks estrena próximamente. Cada personaje posee su propio estilo urbano y sus habilidades (útiles a la hora de impresionar y hacerse respetar), y realiza sus propias acrobacias. Si dominas estas habilidades, también puedes obtener mejoras, personalizar al corredor, ganar retos y descubrir atajos en los formidables entornos dinámicos del mundo de Turbo. • Realiza acrobacias increíbles: Usa el entorno para realizar las acrobacias de Turbo y liderar la carrera. • Conchas con habilidades únicas: Cada una da a tu personaje habilidades exclusivas.

PT.name: Turbo: Super Stunt Squad
PT.description: Dá vida às incríveis acrobacias e corridas de caracóis com Turbo! Turbo: Super Stunt Squad é um jogo de corridas de acção a alta velocidade que apresenta a equipa frenética do filme Turbo. Cada personagem tem o seu próprio estilo característico e habilidades especiais como saltos, drifts, grinds, flips e outros movimentos acrobáticos espectaculares. Estas habilidades também te ajudarão a ganhar power-ups, personalizar a tua personagem, descobrir atalhos e ganhar a corrida nos cenários maiores do que a própria vida de Turbo! • Realiza acrobacias magníficas! – Usa o cenário para realizar acrobacias únicas em modo Turbo e ganhar a liderança • Carapaças com habilidades únicas – Cada carapaça oferece à tua personagem habilidades únicas!

NL.name: Turbo: Super Stunt Squad
NL.description: Breng de ongelofelijke stunts van Turbo tot leven! Turbo: Super Stunt Squad is een razendsnelle racegame boordevol actie, met de indrukwekkende personages uit de nieuwe film. Elk personage heeft zijn eigen straatstijl en baanbrekende vaardigheden die van pas komen als ze respect willen verdienen met sprongen, drifts, grinds, flips en andere supergave stunts. Gebruik de beste vaardigheden om power-ups te verdienen, je personage aan te passen, sluipweggetjes te ontdekken en de race te winnen in de adembenemende omgevingen van Turbo! • Voer geweldige stunts uit! Gebruik de omgeving om unieke stunts uit te voeren en een plaatsje op te schuiven. • Slakkenhuizen met unieke vaardigheden - elk slakkenhuis levert unieke vaardigheden op!

GB.name: Turbo: Super Stunt Squad
GB.description: Bring Turbo’s incredible snail stunts and races to life! Turbo: Super Stunt Squad is a high-velocity action racing game featuring the super-charged crew from the film Turbo. Each character has their own signature style and tricked-out skills such as jumps, drifts, grinds, flips and other super-cool stunt moves. Expert skills will also prove useful to earn power-ups, customize your character, discover shortcuts, and win the race in the larger-than-life environments of Turbo! • Perform awesome stunts! – Use the environment to perform one-of-a-kind Turbo-ized stunts to get ahead in the race • Shells with unique abilities – Each shell gives to your character unique abilities!

IT.name: Turbo: Acrobazie in pista
IT.description: Rivivi le gare e le incredibili acrobazie delle lumache di Turbo! Turbo: Acrobazie in pista è un adrenalinico action game con tutti i protagonisti del film. Ogni personaggio ha il proprio stile caratteristico e può esibirsi in salti, sbandate, grind, capriole e acrobazie di ogni sorta. Le abilità saranno inoltre indispensabili per guadagnare potenziamenti, personalizzare il proprio personaggio, vincere sfide competitive e scoprire scorciatoie nel dinamico mondo di Turbo. • Esibisciti in acrobazie mozzafiato! – Usa a tuo vantaggio l'ambiente per eseguire originalissime acrobazie e superare i tuoi avversari • Gusci con abilità uniche – Ogni guscio darà abilità diverse al tuo personaggio!

SE.name: Turbo: Super Stunt Squad
SE.description: Bring Turbo’s incredible snail stunts and races to life! Turbo: Super Stunt Squad is a high-velocity action racing game featuring the super-charged crew from the film Turbo. Each character has their own signature style and tricked-out skills such as jumps, drifts, grinds, flips and other super-cool stunt moves. Expert skills will also prove useful to earn power-ups, customize your character, discover shortcuts, and win the race in the larger-than-life environments of Turbo! • Perform awesome stunts! – Use the environment to perform one-of-a-kind Turbo-ized stunts to get ahead in the race • Shells with unique abilities – Each shell gives to your character unique abilities!

RU.name: Турбо: Суперкоманда каскадеров
RU.description: Претворите в жизнь невероятные трюки и гонки улиток из команды Турбо! "Турбо: Суперкоманда каскадеров" – это игра с высокоскоростными гонками, в которых участвуют персонажи-каскадеры из будущего мультфильма "Турбо". Каждый персонаж обладает неповторимым стилем и навороченными способностями, необходимыми для выполнения прыжков, заносов, скольжений, переворотов и других классных трюков. Особые способности помогут вам зарабатывать бонусы, изменять персонажей по своему вкусу, находить короткие маршруты и выигрывать гонки в огромном мире игры. • Используйте окружение, чтобы выполнять потрясающие уникальные трюки и вырываться вперед в гонке. • Каждая раковина дает вашему персонажу уникальные способности.
